results.headline: ‘The Super Mario Bros. Movie’ Review: This Ain’t No Game
results.summary_short: A famed video game character side-scrolls once again to the big screen in this bland, witless and flagrantly pandering animated comedy.

link.suggested_link_text: Read the New York Times Review of The Super Mario Bros. Movie

results.headline: SUPER MARIO BROTHERS (MOVIE)
results.summary_short: Brooklyn dinosaurs, via video game. Human cast surprisingly unscathed.
